title: TextBox focus bug when inside ScrollViewer
body: If I have a TextBox (which is wide enough to have a delete button) inside a ScrollViewer, then clicking near the right-hand side of the text box (where the delete button would appear it had focus) fails to focus the text box (the delete button appears after the mouse down and then somehow interferes with the focus). This does not happen if the text box is not inside a ScrollViewer.
